website_summaries.verdict: This football features both impact AND motion-activated LEDs, so you can see it when it's thrown.
pros: Large size makes it good for smaller hands
LEDs illuminate on impact or during movement
Made from BPA-free, latex-free, phthalate-free, non-toxic TPR material
It's the size of a youth football
Lights up when caught, passed or hits the ground
cons: Open piping design means fingers can get stuck and hurt when trying to catch
Doesn't always light as its thrown

customer_reviews.title: much better.
customer_reviews.text: The biggest downside to this football is that it is hard to get it to glow while being thrown. Shouldn't that be the whole point? You can't very well play at night if the ball doesn't light up in the air. It only consistently lights up upon impact with hands or the ground. An on/off switch would be much, much better.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF L.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this product. Cheaply made and it only glows if you tap or shake it. So it doesn’t glow while playing catch. Also I selected one day shipping and it took 3 days to come and literally got delivered as we were walking out the door! All around huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthea Alvidrez

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Mine lit up on impact and with hard throws, but not short tosses, like the type you’d throw to an eight year old. It looks nothing like the promo video when thrown. I may have got a dud. It’s being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jabba D. Hut

customer_reviews.title: ... large footballs for my nephews and they are the perfect size for an adult
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 large footballs for my nephews and they are the perfect size for an adult! They light up just like the videos show. We had bought some from Walmart that were $10.00 and theye only light up when contact was made. That is NOT the case with these! The better the spiral the better the light! We will be purchasing another one for our son! Definitely worth the $20.00!
customer_reviews.author: Membry

customer_reviews.title: Too Hard
customer_reviews.text: This ball is really hard and will actually hurt a young kid trying to catch it. It is really bright and fun to see in the dark. It's just sad it's so hard. My kids only throw it one direction and are afraid to catch it.
customer_reviews.author: Feather Chucker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dog at night!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ball! I actually use it at night for my hyper Australian Shepherd! He loved to fetch & there are some nights I don’t get home until after dark & this works perfectly for him! I do have put it out of reach after play bc he will chew it, & it’s nit made to be that durable, but I love it & will continue to buy again & again when he tears it up!
customer_reviews.author: S RORO

customer_reviews.title: Tried it with the girls..ok  Will try with the guys to see if they get better grip
customer_reviews.text: It does light up well. Construction makes it a bit awkward for small children and people with small hands to throw. Don't recommend throwing in dirt area. The dirt gets all inside the ball as it is open construction. That being said it can easily be rinsed off, just stay away from LED panel and let air dry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How to change batteries
customer_reviews.text: the way this football works is any bumping and the lights good off.> Very bright but I am assuming that the lights have been going off 100% of the time during shipping.. The lights only flicker.. I would like to change the batteries but there doesnt seem to be a way to do that... for $25 you would expect this to be a disposable product.
customer_reviews.author: John Sebesta

customer_reviews.title: Useless Design.  Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ball to play with my son in the dark, but as soon as it stops moving, the light goes out. So if you drop it, you either need a flashlight, or to wait until the next day to find it. I get that there is a desire to preserve the battery but this makes using the ball at night completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: A. P. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fun football
customer_reviews.text: My step-son was pretty excited to get this for Christmas. We went out and tried it, it works okay. The problem we found is that with longer throws, it lights up great when you throw it, but then the light goes out before it reaches the receiver. So it kind of works for us. With short throws it's fine, but my boys are 11 and 13, they throw it pretty far.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Novellino

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! Buy the size large.
customer_reviews.text: You will surely Get lots of attention and compliments with this product. Everyone seems to love it. I ordered the large size and was glad I did. It's about the size of a nerf football. It works great and looks awesome. The only reason I didn't give four stars is because it doesn't throw all that well. Due to its material and shape you have to put a little more work in to get it to fly farther. It's not really that difficult but definitely noticeable. It a bit awkward for inexperienced throwers but not if you're standing closer together. Overall I am glad I purchased it and would recommend it, no question.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle b.

customer_reviews.title: Great for tiring out high-energy dogs
customer_reviews.text: We throw this ball back and forth in the back yard for our pit bull. It's the only way to tire her our properly. We had an old one of these we let her tear apart and it lasted for a week or two of intense, uh.... decommissioning. The light-up feature leaves a bit to be desired, though. It doesn't allowed for great depth perception, so the game doesn't last long before she gets ahold of the ball and runs off.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: We have the Tangle soccer ball and love it, so decided we should try the football as well. It's clearly not a regular football so keep your spiral expectations low. But the kids love it and it looks cool glowing through the air at night.
customer_reviews.author: Somepublicname

customer_reviews.title: This works great! Just remember you have to be able to ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Just remember you have to be able to throw a fast spinning good spiral to get it to work properly, someone that can't throw a spiral may not like this product
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: Good to have to play at night.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 7 year old. It's bendable, lights up really good, and light weight. Fun to throw around and easy to see at night. This was a good little gift.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty/Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Amazon made me buy it
customer_reviews.text: I worked at amazon and got distracted by this lighting up everytime a bin opened...convinced me to buy it that’s what happened
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read. :)
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty neat. My only complaint is that it only lights up when thrown. We are still enjoying this though. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: girls love this!! They especially like playing at night of course but the grip and style pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Chgo5

customer_reviews.title: Fun but hard on my son’s hands
customer_reviews.text: This ball is fun to play with in the evenings however my son does complain that the hard plastic hurts his hands. He prefers to play with a different ball for that reason. However older boys might not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H.

customer_reviews.title: Good for use in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: Our son received this as a gift. It gets dark earlier but he can still toss a football in the back yard with his brother and dad because this illuminates. It's weird that the light only comes on with movement. So, if it accidentally gets stuck in a bush and the light turns off it would be difficult to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Rofomom

customer_reviews.title: Size and quality
customer_reviews.text: Really small, bought as Christmas gift for my 15 year old, but will end up being used as gift for my 3 year old... disappointing
customer_reviews.author: tracy c

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to have at the Boy Scouts camping. Only negative thing is it only lights up with vibrations so it’s hard to use when it’s dark.
customer_reviews.author: PJP327

customer_reviews.title: Ok Buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little harder plastic than anticipated, difficult for my 6 year old to catch and throw. More for preteens or older.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: A Great Glow-In-The-Dark Football!
customer_reviews.text: This item is very sturdy, easy to use, and kids will enjoy hours playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: R. N.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and all around fun for day and night
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended! We ended up bringing this to the beach on family vacation and it was played with in and out of water, and as a "fetch" toy with a VERY overzealous retriever. It is still in great working condition and makes for terrific day and night pick-up football games. If I HAD to find a not-so-great criticism, it would just be that there are big holes and it is, therefore, a little more difficult than a regular football to pick up off the ground when running in a fast-paced game.
customer_reviews.author: SMJ

customer_reviews.title: Great feel but requires a good spiral to stay lit.
customer_reviews.text: Has a great feel. My only complaint is that you really have to spiral it to make the light stay on. My kid has a hard time with that. If they could have just included a little timer that would keep it lit for 3 seconds after it senses motion I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a boy!
customer_reviews.text: Our Grandson has had hours of joy from this football. He loves the glow in the dark feature.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Barber

customer_reviews.title: Glo no mo'
customer_reviews.text: In less than 2 months the football has stopped glowing. There does not appear a way to access the batteries so now we have to throw it away and buy another one. I cannot recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Decent fun toy for outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool toy for kids. My nephew seems to enjoy it. Too cold outside to play with it just yet. Has been playing with it indoors in the pool room, seems to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: My 13 year old niece and nephew really enjoyed this ball
customer_reviews.text: Took this camping with the family. My 13 year old niece and nephew really enjoyed this ball. It lights up through motion and is a lot of fun at night. We were playing in a field with no other lights around and the neon green light was quite brilliant. I was surprised how much teenagers enjoyed tossing this around.
customer_reviews.author: Gombay77

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Awesome Lights, but...
customer_reviews.text: We love the light up football, but my 9-year old reports it's hard to catch as compared to a standard football. He will play catch with friends for a few minutes before switching back to the standard football. It appears to be well made but we wouldn't recommend or buy again since it's not being used!
customer_reviews.author: Kalamamalolo

customer_reviews.title: Large and Small
customer_reviews.text: Really cool! Ignore the reviews about it being really small, unless you ordered the SMALL version. Lol. Pay attention to the details when you order! We purchased the LARGE, which isn't the size of a real football, but it's also not small. So much fun! My 8 and 6 year old boys love it! So do I!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea.  Poor Execution
customer_reviews.text: Was fun for a quick (too quick) round of family football tossing for about 15 minutes. Adults and child enjoyed...until it broke. Semi-uncoordinated 12 year old missed a few passes and the rubber ripped in several spots, rendering it useless.
customer_reviews.author: Time2Buy

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: same as the softball looking purchase i made.. very disappointed.. we purchased these for the kids at night on the beach.. and it doesn't light up very long and so you can't see it to catch it. very expensive to not be able to change out the batteries also. will not purchase from the company who made the item again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great football for playing at night!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons were so pleased with this football. With daylight savings time it gets dark so soon after school, this football gives them some playing time into dusk!! They loved it!!! We could watch out the window and see the football flying through the air!!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat, works.
customer_reviews.text: More for novelties..... doesn't feel right when throwing or catching
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This ball is cool! It lights up when you throw and catch ...
customer_reviews.text: This ball is cool! It lights up when you throw and catch it. My boys love it! Easy to catch too becasue is the holes. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn G

customer_reviews.title: Fun Football at night
customer_reviews.text: My grandson enjoyed playing outside in the dark with this football.
customer_reviews.author: Kay V

customer_reviews.title: Great little gift
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this little glow in the dark foot ball. It takes time away from video games
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun football, great for water
customer_reviews.text: This football is so much fun! I am a 35 year old female and love this football. It is very easy for all ages to use. I used it in a pool and it worked great there as well. This is a fun product! The only downside is that you cannot change the battery yourself, but it should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift 2 seasons ago. This is one durable ball kids still play with it weekly inside and outside. Made well great gift idea that lasts !!
customer_reviews.author: laurie childers

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: Product didn’t work. Sent it back for a replacement and the second one didn’t work and I had to send it back also. Good idea but poor design.
customer_reviews.author: DJMac302

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my son...wished it would stay lit during play, but only lights up on impact.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good for inside the house also!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 1/2 year old grandson. Loved it because he could through it in the house and it just bounces because it is soft rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Rightmeow

customer_reviews.title: 2 1/2 year old gift!
customer_reviews.text: This large size football is awesome! Lights up when in the air and when it hits the ground! Really fun for a 2 1/2 yr old and older!
customer_reviews.author: S. R. GREEN

customer_reviews.title: Night time fun
customer_reviews.text: My boys (and husband) love playing with this! They go out at night and can just see the ball, they have a lot of fun with it
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great...your kids will love this!
customer_reviews.text: Oh, good lord. My boys absolutely LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this ball & all the neighborhood kids love it too. Good quality. Love the lights at night! It is great & they love it. Still works good so far & had it played (roughly) that long, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Cosner Fox

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fun for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, the smaller size and grip makes it great for kids to learn how to throw the ball and we adults used it just as much at the beach and in the back yard. Looks fantastic when you throw it at night as long as you get a good spin going. I do not expect it to last for years but has got some pretty heavy usage so far and is still working well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality..after years of play it still lights up and is a perfect size for younger hands as well as fun for older ones
customer_reviews.author: Booksrmything

customer_reviews.title: Why no on/off switch?
customer_reviews.text: Pretty poor in execution. It only lights up when it's in a tight spiral. So if you drop the back you can't see it. Needs to have an on/off switch. This method of turning on is awful. Also you can't change the batteries. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Just me...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THE SPECIAL AWESOME KIDS WHO GOT THESE FOOTBALLS WERE THRILLED.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Foley

customer_reviews.title: does not stay lit, hit my friend in the face because it went dark before she caught it
customer_reviews.text: does not stay lit, hit my friend in the face because it went dark before she caught it
customer_reviews.author: KIMBER BLACK

customer_reviews.title: Really cool!
customer_reviews.text: "Man, Cookie, I thought this thing was pretty cool when I played with it but it's awesome at night! It lights up all the way to the next person when you throw it!" Enough said?? That's my 11 year olds description:)
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: It works too well!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my son. He throws it every evening and it get to experience neon lights past my face every few seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and love how it glows in the dark
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Football 🏈
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would really lite up but only if u hit it does it glow. Was disappointed in the ball think grandson was too..was ok as just a football 🏈
customer_reviews.author: Barbbe

customer_reviews.title: I can't even rate this a zero
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't light up unless you hit it hard. I am sure in shipping the battery just wears out. I am not only disappointed..I'm mad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can Not Replace Battery
customer_reviews.text: Kids like the ball but when the batteries die so does the ball. The batteries CAN NOT be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Probably would not buy again or recommend. But the kids did love throwing it and ...
customer_reviews.text: The football lights up okay. Main concern is it is very hard to get to the small watch size batteries - not sure how to do this. Other issue is the ball came with no instructions on how to change the batteries. Probably would not buy again or recommend. But the kids did love throwing it and they said it was easy to catch.
customer_reviews.author: momtoonlyone

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: This was a Birthday present for my Grandson, who just turned 10. He really likes this and it really lights up at night. Thank-You.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Otis

customer_reviews.title: son-in-law and husband ALL loved this football
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons, son-in-law and husband ALL loved this football! Even better than described. The reviews helped me get the size I wanted - I was considering the small one for my 5 year old grandson, but the reviews commented on how small it was so I went with the bigger one - it is perfect! Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenette Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Best birthday present!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect birthday present for a sports loving 6-10 year old! Great price point
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Casey

customer_reviews.title: A winner !
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this for throwing at night ! Looks really cool too !!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia F.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This football does not stay lit once you stop tapping it.........so catching it at night is basically impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: No way to turn off the light so it seems to have lost its battery life during shipping where it probably was lighting up with every movement.
customer_reviews.author: AGE

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and Bright LED Football
customer_reviews.text: Super bright LEDs make it fun to throw around at night with my son. Smaller than a regular sized foot makes it much easier to throw and catch for kids. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Boston Tea

customer_reviews.title: The lights are great especially the flashing lights at night
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, exactly as pictured and described. Bought this as a birthday present for nephew who loves football! The lights are great especially the flashing lights at night.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hogg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it, and the holes make it easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Trowbridge

customer_reviews.title: must have for night football
customer_reviews.text: this is awesome. if you shake it or throw a perfect spiral it stays lit. If you throw a bad pass, it does not stay lit in mid air. has a rubbery feel to it and is easy to catch.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boys LOVE it! and love the fact we can use this at night!!!
customer_reviews.author: RollerDerbyMomma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised! All the boys were excited to get these as presents.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Y

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. The picture is a little deceiving though because it appears to be a solid football but it's not so it can be tricky to grip for small hands
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for kids or adults.
customer_reviews.text: Really cool ball that you can easily toss around at night. You will be surprised with how much zip you can out on it. Good for adults or kids. Get it and have some fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Hardly lights up
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t light up nearly as much as it does in the video. This was going to be a Christmas gift, but we will not be using this as a gift unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby C

customer_reviews.title: Great ball I like the idea that is waterproof works ...
customer_reviews.text: Great ball I like the idea that is waterproof works well in the pool too. I hope the batteries last a while since they're not changeable.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Light op football?? WOOOOO HOOOOO!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the illumination of the ball. Throws & spins nice!!!! A must have for the warm weather months!!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother for Christmas - he absolutely LOVES it. It's incredibly bright, and works exactly as advertised! Only thing we're unsure of yet, since it is new, is the battery life. Hopefully it lasts a long time! :)
customer_reviews.author: CWi

customer_reviews.title: lights up nice; get yourselfs lightup necklaces so you can see ...
customer_reviews.text: smaller than expected; more for kids than adults; lights up nice; get yourselfs lightup necklaces so you can see other players in dark
customer_reviews.author: rita

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase at first.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 8-yr. old son AND 14-yr. old nephew for Christmas last year. Both loved it! It provided hours of entertainment. Even the adults liked to head out to play at night. However, it stopped lighting up in August. Once that happened, the ball completely lost it's appeal and it's sitting in the corner of our basement now.
customer_reviews.author: CAZRB

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son for his 15th Bday......he loved it....we all have fun tossing it around at night. Ton of fun and the more spin in the throw the brighter it gets!
customer_reviews.author: Mo Butts

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my sons second ball only bc the dog got ahold of the 1st one. Works well for my 11yr old and his friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jynell

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: A little mini football for the price...what a joke. So disappointed. If there was a way to show zero stars I would
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Fun at night
customer_reviews.text: We've had this ball for awhile and it still lights up when you hit it. Fun at night. Not as large as a real football but still perfect for an evening game.
customer_reviews.author: liz18ard

customer_reviews.title: A gift for my nephew and he likes it, ...
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my nephew and he likes it, enough to pester me into going out a throwing it around, a heck of alot!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Van Deventer

customer_reviews.title: Lights did not work on one side, when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Lights did not work on one side, when I got it, and second set stopped working two days into our trip... Junky but the kids still used it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Defective. It’s not shaped like a football. Will be demanding refund immediately
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this! Easy, healthy, fun entertainment. The ball has held up well for about a year now. Arrived quickly
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Grant

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun football, my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun football, my son loves it! He took it in the pool and now the lights won't go off, but I'm sure that's because it's not meant to go in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Shanelle

customer_reviews.title: but it's a good size and he likes it
customer_reviews.text: gave to a 2 year old, it's hard for him to get it to light up, but it's a good size and he likes it. material is soft enough that he doesn't damage anything when he throws it. it's small if you're wanting it for an adult and it has to spin fast to light up
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old grandson loves the ball, great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Nookie

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this ball. Not sure how long the battery will last and it doesn't appear you can replace it. However, at this price I would just buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Football
customer_reviews.text: This football is great! Take it out when it's totally dark and you'll be amazed. We've had it for 1 month and it's still lighting up. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great for playing fetch in the dark! Two paws up!
customer_reviews.author: MJ-C

customer_reviews.title: Who needs daylight savings time
customer_reviews.text: Use every night. Perfect spirals everytime. Every neighbor thinks its cool, wants one for nephew, aon, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Rich

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! I was a little skeptical about how long ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I was a little skeptical about how long it would stay lit while flying through the air and its brightness. As soon as my kids and their friends started playing with it, I knew this was going to be a big hit. They are ages 8-16 and have used it almost every night for the past 2 weeks. It is easy to see even on very dark nights. Overall a great toy to get the kids outside burning off some energy after dark!
customer_reviews.author: Sauerkraut

customer_reviews.title: Coolest football on the block
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and all her neighborhood buddies love this. Gets the kids outside, away from screens, and having good clean fun.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Shankel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very cool gift for boys. My son spent forever outside playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Rozman

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: FUN for the whole family. Very bright lights. I have 10 and 12 year old boys who have every much enjoyed this ball that Santa brought them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fun - I take night walks with my 14 ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fun - I take night walks with my 14 year old and this ball throws well and lights up beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Boys love it! My only complaint is make sure you ...
customer_reviews.text: Boys love it! My only complaint is make sure you understand, the ball only lights when it is in motion. Very good and bright though.
customer_reviews.author: Mom B.

product_meta.title: Tangle NightBall Glow in the Dark Light Up LED Football, Green with Blue
product_meta.description:
Do ever get that itch to get active, but it’s already dark out? Introducing Tangle Creations NightBall. It’s the football that you can play with any time of day. It doesn’t matter how late you get home or how short the days are getting, play football until you’re ready for bed! The Tangle NightBall Football is easy for everyone to the throw. Its larger size is great for smaller hands and the matrix design make it easy to throw and catch – day or night. Throw it through the air for a perfect pass or punt it for a fantastic field goal. It will light up the sky! Don’t worry about the ball going dark on you and getting lost in the night. The NightBall is designed to illuminate both upon impacts or during movement. Each toss, bounce, and roll of the ball triggers the light so you never lose track of it. The ball lights up, but the other players might not. Playing in the dark puts a new spin on your game. You can sneak up on someone and swoop in to steal the ball. They will literally never see you coming until it’s too late! Package contains (1) Tangle NightBall Glow in the Dark Light Up LED Football. Made from BPA-free, latex-free, phthalate-free, non-toxic TPR material. LED motion activated technology, the more it moves the brighter it lights up. Requires one non-standard battery (included).

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Never before has the world played with a football this cool. The NightBall is easy to catch and throw for everyone, with all abilities. And with the NightBall, the real fun starts when the sun goes down. The NightBall has special LED lights that get brighter when you throw it. The NightBall is literally hours of fun - all day and all night.
